title: Let's Do This! 100 Powerful Messages to Help You Take Action
description: There really are no secrets to success. It simply takes correct strategy and hard work but until you can commit and discipline yourself to do what's necessary, you're going to remain a dreamer.Any ideas and strategies you learn that deals with success and achieving your dreams are pointless unless you are able to get yourself to follow through and do what's required to get the things you want. If you want to change your life, then it's time to put what you already know into practice.Contained in this book are 100 short but powerful messages designed to motivate you to take action by helping to change your mindset.
author: Kevin Ngo
